summary: A salesman chasing by car a beautiful female biker in order to flirt finds a castle where he is accused in a game trial for murder.
cast: Alberto Sordi|Michel Simon|Charles Vanel|Claude Dauphin|Janet Agren|Giuseppe Maffioli|Pierre Brasseur|Hans-Jürgen Ballmann|Dieter Ballmann|Bruno Boschetti|Giorgio Ricci
title: La più bella serata della mia vita
